body.name: It's Skin Peptide Collagen Toner 5.07 Fl Oz | Moisturizing Toner with Organic Collagen Peptides | Hydrating Toner for Sensitive Skin | Organic Skin Care & Face Brightening Toner | K Beauty Toner
features: DEEP HYDRATION. This beauty collagen toner has a mild formula that provides deep hydration to your skin, leaving it feeling smooth and supple. It effectively restores the moisture balance of your skin which is essential for maintaining a well-hydrated and youthful-looking complexion.

FIRMING POWER. This face toner contains vegan collagen and oat peptide that work together to improve wrinkles and increase skin elasticity. Regular use of this toner can help improve skin firmness and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

RICH NUTRIENTS. The pinkish moisturizing texture of this hydrating toner is packed with rich nutrients that heal dry and damaged skin. The toner is formulated with ingredients that are designed to nourish your skin and support its overall wellness.

VEGAN & HYPOALLERGENIC. This organic collagen skin toner is formulated without 10 harsh ingredients and is vegan-friendly, making it an ethical and skin-friendly choice. Its hypoallergenic and mild formula hydrates, firms, and soothes your skin to achieve a glowing complexion.

DEEP CLEANSING. This Korean toner gently but effectively removes impurities and excess oil while moisturizing your skin. Its deep cleansing and alcohol-free formula will leave your skin feeling clean, refreshed, and revitalized.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What are the key benefits? Intensive Hydration This toner helps the skin retain its moisture balance while effectively cleansing your skin. The collagen also aids with keeping the skin nicely hydrated and moisturized. Lift + Firm Regular use of this toner can assist in tightening and toning your skin, resulting in a reduction of fine lines and wrinkles. This remarkable transformation is achieved by harnessing the power of collagen and oat peptides. Alcohol-Free Mild Formula This gentle formula effectively eliminates impurities and excess oil from the skin, while being alcohol-free and avoiding any discomforting sensations or tightness after use.

What are the key benefits? Collagen Peptide (Oat peptide) This is a key player in maintaining youthful-looking skin. Containing Glycine and Alanine, it’s the protein responsible for keeping our skin firm and plump, giving us the radiant appearance. The oats have abundant nutrients that help nourish and soothe the skin, playing a crucial role in keeping our skin hydrated. Niacinamide (B3) A type of vitamin B that helps brighten and refine the skin texture. Not only does it retain moisture within the skin but it reinforces the skin barrier over time. It contributes to strengthening your skin for an improved complexion. Betaine A mild ingredient that helps balance skin’s moisture level & retains it for a plump and firm look. This feature also helps refine the skin texture while its other function is to inhibit oxidation to turn back the clock on the age of your skin.

Peptide Collagen Cleansing Foam Peptide Collagen Toner Peptide Collagen Serum Peptide Collagen Moisturizer Suitable For All, Sensitive Skin All, Sensitive Skin Sensitive + Dry Skin Sensitive + Dry Skin Volume 150mL 150mL 40mL 50mL Texture Foamy Viscous but watery Creamy & rich Creamy How to use 1 2 3 4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice toner doesn’t dry me out no weird smell at all so far so good !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous branding, very hydrating toner, where's niacinamide though?
reviews.reviewText: ✅Likes:○ I feared I might've been overly swayed by the GORGEOUS packaging on this one but it's surprisingly nice for a toner! I normally don't see the point of toners- most seem like water and hard to apply w/ hands and ultimately end up feeling like an extra unnecessary step that I'm the first to skip when lazy in my skin care routine. However this seems more like a serum than a toner! Seems like it would be great for providing slippery surface w/ facial massagers/devices.○ Seems extremely hydrating for a toner, glycerin is a great product that I've been trying to replace my hyaluronic acid products with eventually.○ Love that this is alcohol free and has some other interesting ingredients (LIST AT BOTTOM), that my scanner likes:Adenosine - wound healing, anti-inflammatory, potential collagen production assist, barrier repair + protect,Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate - (licorice?) soothing/anti-inflammatory, might be sebum regulatingBetaine - moisturize+skin protect, osmolyte control cell water balance○ Mostly fragrance free, there's some sort of distant botanical/floral echo of a scent in there but "basically" no strong fragrances or anything. There's only one ingredient that came up on the "icky" rating on my scanner site and it's the "Rosa Damascena Flower Oil" which seems to be an expensive ingredient which is an antioxidant, perfuming, and antimicrobial/antibacterial agent 🤷‍♀️ possible irritant I guess but it's low on the list and doesn't sound too dangerous to me tbh○ Expires 2025, clearly written at bottle bottom- great!❌Dislikes:● Weirdly I don't see Niacinamide nor Alanine in the ingredients list despite it being in the listing info?● Bit hard to get out of the bottle, need to shake it to get anything out and when you do it just splats everywhere. I know most toners have bottles with basic openings like this but most toners aren't this viscous. I wish it had a squirt depositing pump head.● Also FYI it's a plastic bottle (not frosted glass like I'd expected) and the bottle is too firm/thick to squeeze anything out which seems a bit unnecessary plastic-wise. Thick screw cap too. Would've probably served better to make it thinner plastic to help control depositing product.🔮FUTURE/TBA:~ Any glaringly obvious long term skin benefits due to this product.💸Would you repurchase?:Not totally sure yet if I see the "value for product" yet for my personal budget. Based on the market and my frugality, I'm unsure yet if it would be a definite re-purchase. I will certainly update in the distant future if it is.First impressions, will update if I find further benefits or issues w/ more use in the future.Ingredients: WATER, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, NEOPENTYL GLYCOL DIHEPTANOATE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL/CAPRYL GLUCOSIDE, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, POLYGLYCERYL-10 LAURATE, CARBOMER, COLLAGEN EXTRACT, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, TROMETHAMINE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ADENOSINE, POLYGLYCERYL-10 OLEATE, XANTHAN GUM, DISODIUM EDTA, JUNIPERUS MEXICANA OIL, PYRUS COMMUNIS (PEAR) FRUIT EXTRACT, MELIA AZADIRACHTA FLOWER EXTRACT, MELIA AZADIRACHTA LEAF EXTRACT, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER, IRIS FLORENTINA ROOT EXTRACT, ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER OIL, BETAINE, CUCUMIS MELO (MELON) FRUIT EXTRACT, HEDERA HELIX (IVY) LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, AVENA SATIVA (OAT) PEPTIDE, COCCINIA INDICA FRUIT EXTRACT, CORALLINA OFFICINALIS EXTRACT, POGOSTEMON CABLIN OIL, VETIVERIA ZIZANOIDES ROOT OIL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent toner. Super fast delivery, beautiful pink glass bottle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY NICE COLLAGEN TONER
reviews.reviewText: VERY VERY VERY NICE COLLAGEN TONER. It has really nice (almost nothing) scent and is easy to use. Also, when you see the effectiveness of the item, it is AMAZINGLY great value regarding the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Weird and overpriced!
reviews.reviewText: At $22 for this toner it is overpriced. It comes in a glass bottle. I was surprised to find that it is thick which makes it hard to get out of the glass bottle. You need quite a bit to cover your face and neck so the value just isn't there. Smell isn't good or bad just eh. Would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This seems okay – I can’t tell what ingredients are peptides but it does have adenosine and glycerin which are nice. It’s not very hydrating on it’s own, so definitely use this after cleansing (while skin is still moist) and before any serums/emulsions/lotions, etc. If you let it dry out, it feels preeetty dry. It would take a while to notice any peptide/collagen products making any difference – if you want faster results, I like It’s Skin’s new V7 hyaluronic toner a lot (bouncy & brightening, but it has fragrance).INGREDIENTS:water, butylene glycol, glycerin, dipropylene glycol, neopentyl glycol diheptanoate, 1,2-hexanediol, caprylyl/capryl glucoside, hydroxyacetophenone, polyglyceryl-10 laurate, carbomer, collagen extract, caprylyl glycol, tromethamine, tocopheryl acetate, adenosine, polyglyceryl-10 oleate, xanthan gum, disodium edta, juniperus mexicana oil, pyrus communis (pear) fruit extract, melia azadirachta flower extract, melia azadirachta leaf extract, dipotassium glycyrrhizate, rosa damascena flower water, iris florentina root extract, rosa damascena flower oil, betaine, cucumis melo (melon) fruit extract, hedera helix (ivy) leaf/stem extract, avena sativa (oat) peptide, coccinia indica fruit extract, corallina officinalis extract, pogostemon cablin oil, vetiveria zizanoides root oil

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm in love with this toner!
reviews.reviewText: Ugh, I just wrote this super long review on this product with like three paragraphs describing everything I love about this toner, and for some reason, Amazon didn't save it and now have to start over!Anyway, I use this in conjunction with their serum and this combo does amazing things for my skin. I love the packaging and think it is so pretty. However, it's kinda hard to get the product out of the bottle since it is pretty thick, and think they should've made the bottle less hard or somewhat squeezable. Or they could've made the hole at the top larger so the product dispenses easier. The toner itself is nice and moisturizing and I feel so clean and refreshed after applying. I use it both day and night as these products aren't too heavy for daytime use but moisturizing enough for nighttime use. I love this line so much, that I'm thinking about buying the cleanser and the moisturizing cream as well. My skin actually does feel more youthful after about a week or so of using it daily. I'm a new fan of this company and would definitely purchase other products from several of their lines. I highly recommend this line for everyone but especially for those who love their skincare!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used this for several weeks now. The bottle is nice and it is easy to use. I use it first out of the shower and later place moisturizer overtop. I waited to write a review to see if I noticed any visible difference in my skin. I have not at this time. No difference in wrinkles or tightness. However, I do like using this product. It feels nice being applied and kind of has a pampering quality about it. It moisturizes but not enough for the dry desert heat. So I still use a second moisturizer. Overall I like this I just wish I had seen wrinkle improvement sooner (or at all)...
